name: Mahjong Trails Match
description:
Tap those tiles in the swiftest, sweetest take on the matching classic EVER! From the makers of Mahjong Trails, the world’s most popular mahjong game, Mahjong Trails Match brings the fun to mobile in an ALL-NEW game!

- Face an ever-growing array of UNIQUE LEVELS!
- Experience CLASSIC mahjong gameplay, remastered and updated for mobile!
- ADVENTURE across the majestic Sky Isles as you help Tilly rescue her woodland friends from the villainous owl Singe!
- Race your FRIENDS and see whose matching skills reign supreme!

Mahjong Trails Match is the next evolution of the world-famous franchise and a perfect chance for everyone to experience the fun! Join Tilly and millions of fans and hop into new lands of mystery and delight!
